Message.MsgText: PROX0109W=PROX0109W: The trusted security proxy host name/ip address {0} created an exception.
Message.Explanation: The proxy server received an exception when converting the text host name or ip address to an InetAddress object.
Message.UserResponse: Configure the proxy server to use trusted security proxies by adding hostnames or ip addresses. Separate multiple entries on one line with a space or comma.

Message.MsgText: PROX0111I=PROX0111I: The Proxy Server will retry socket connection to target {0}. Retry count {1}, retry limit {2}. An attempt to establish a socket connection failed with exception {3}.
Message.Explanation: The http.connectRetryLimit custom property is used to configure the Proxy Server to retry failed socket connections.
Message.UserResponse: No user action is required unless you want to disable the configuration setting.

Message.MsgText: PROX0107W=PROX0107W: The proxy-environment.xml file in the cell-scope could not be located.
Message.Explanation: This configuration document contains the cell-wide definitions for the proxy server configuration. The file is missing or corrupted. This warning message could be ignored if generic server routing rules are not defined.
Message.UserResponse: Review the proxy server creation. Contact the vendor if the configuration has not been customized.

Message.MsgText: PROX0101I=PROX0101I: Proxy Server being started as {0}.
Message.Explanation: The proxy server has started with the specified deployment type specified
Message.UserResponse: No user action is required for this type of message

Message.MsgText: PROX0108W=PROX0108W: The proxy-settings.xml file in the cluster/server-scope could not be located.
Message.Explanation: This configuration document contains the cluster and server definitions for the proxy server configuration. The file is missing or corrupted.
Message.UserResponse: Review the proxy server creation. Contact the vendor if the configuration has not been customized.

Message.MsgText: PROX0110I=PROX0110I: The server at {0} is a trusted security proxy.
Message.Explanation: The Proxy Server is configured to recognize the identified server as a trusted intermediary. Special request headers received from that server will be forwarded to the application server.

Message.MsgText: PROX0102I=PROX0102I: The proxy channel chains {0} have been started.
Message.Explanation: The channel chains that are identified by channel chain group have been started. The proxy server will receive requests on the associated ports.
Message.UserResponse: No user action is required for this type of message
